dependencies.description:
Stanford CoreNLP provides a set of human language technology tools. It
can give the base forms of words, their parts of speech, whether they
are names of companies, people, etc., normalize dates, times, and
numeric quantities, mark up the structure of sentences in terms of
phrases and syntactic dependencies, indicate which noun phrases refer to
the same entities, indicate sentiment, extract particular or open-class
relations between entity mentions, get the quotes people said, etc.
dependencies.name: corenlp

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
Python wrapper for Stanford CoreNLP. This simply wraps the API from the
server included with CoreNLP.
name: py-pycorenlp

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
